name: Trial By Fire (Natick High School Games)
name_original: Trial By Fire (Natick High School Games)
description:
Trial By Fire is a First Person Action Souls-Like made by a team of 5 in the Spring of 2019.  This team set forth to create a very ambitious 3D game with multiple new technical achievements they had not done in any projects prior.  The art team joined together to create some large assets while also learning to animate in Maya for the first time and implement those into Unity.  The programming team created unique mechanics, like the hookshot system, which grabbed the attention of all who wanted to play.

Team:

Nolan P - Programming

Brian C - Art/Animation

Flynn S - Art

Alex E - Design and Programming

Mina Z - Design

How to Play:

WASD  to Move

Mouse to Look

Left Click to Swing Sword

Right Click to Use Grappling Hook

Shift to Sprint
